title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date() as value in table filter.
description: When a new Date() is used as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When a new Date("3/2/2005") is used as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: When a new Date("3/2/2005") is used as a value in a table filter, the filter should be applied correctly without any error message.
SR:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column.
3. Enter new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in the filter field.
